title: How to Use a Gamecube Controller on a Wii

steps.title: Look for the four GameCube Controller slots.
steps.content: Look for the four GameCube Controller slots. You should be able to lift a tab revealing the controller slots and Memory Card slot.

steps.title: Plug the GameCube Controller into the controller slot.
steps.content: Plug the GameCube Controller into the controller slot.

steps.title: Insert a Nintendo GameCube Controller compatible Wii game or a Nintendo GameCube game.
steps.content: Insert a Nintendo GameCube Controller compatible Wii game or a Nintendo GameCube game.
